contributionDescription:
Technology changes your perception. The The future is a decentralized world and an independently operating economic system, in which companies or individuals will operate their own space.  I don’t need to explain it in an academic way. Here are a few simple examples so you can understand:
 The cinema has become a place for collective adventure. Everyone’s movie theme is the same, but the ending is different for everyone involved, because you are you and he is him. The virtual characters everyone encounters may be the same, but the participants, Everyone's decision may be different.  In the future, human beings will be under increasing mental pressure. Hospitals have also been designed with metaverses to treat various mental illnesses. Robots will do the surgery for them.
impactDescription: Blockchain is a future trend. We are currently standing at the starting point of the trend. One person has a certain power. When there are 10,000 people, the power is infinitely amplified. In the future world, life will have the shadow of blockchain. You cannot Even if you ignore it, you have to use it, and I am a part of the power. Standing at the turning point of the world, I need to continue to learn. Knowledge is the wealth of the future. When you are full of energy, you will be the elite of the future. British.
recategorizeReason: NO, the application is not correctly categorized. The applicant refers to themselves as "I" and "me", indicating that it should be categorized as "INDIVIDUAL" instead of "PROJECT".
